text: Ronald Adrian Nirenberg (born April 11, 1977) is an American politician. He is the Mayor of San Antonio, Texas since 2017. He was a member of the San Antonio City Council for District 8 for two terms. He was sworn into office on June 21, 2017. ==References== Category:1977 births Category:Living people Category:Mayors of San Antonio Category:Independent politicians in the United States Category:Politicians from Boston
title: Ron Nirenberg
